page.title: September Storms Left Retailers All Wet
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Top U.S. retailers, including Wal-Mart Stores Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WMT.N</A>, reported lackluster September sales on Thursday, as warm weather and string of hurricanes that battered the East Coast dampened buying.
